mapper.select: select point.p_idx p_idx,point.midx midx,member.name name,company.cname cname,point.p_date p_date,point.p_cal p_cal,point.p_type p_type from point,member,payment,book,company where point.midx=member.midx and payment.bk_idx=book.bk_idx and book.cidx=company.cidx and p_cal<0 order by point.p_idx
select point.p_idx p_idx,point.midx midx,member.name name,point.p_date p_date,point.p_cal p_cal,point.p_type p_type from point,member where point.midx=member.midx and p_cal>0 order by point.p_idx
